Postponement is a weighty decision, made in order to present an even more exciting lineup of activities and a stronger musical roster, ensuring that the Spaceport experience continues to astonish visitors as if it were their first time. We are committed to maintaining our quality standards and refuse to compromise. We extend our most sincere apologies to every traveler who has been waiting.

Â 

Please visit the new page to purchase tickets for the rescheduled date: https://spaceport.kktix.cc/events/spaceport2024

Flight Time: May 25 - May 26, 2024

Terminal: Taoyuan Sunlight Arena

We fully understand that the postponement may be disappointing and inconvenient for travelers who have already purchased tickets. Therefore, we are offering the following options, hoping to bring everyone the utmost convenience:

âœ¨Those who have purchased tickets for the originally scheduled dates, whether they have yet to request a refund/exchange or have already done so, can apply for a refund at any time. We will accept refund requests until 5:00 PM on the last day of the event date of SPACEPORT, 2024.

âœ¨For those who confirm their refund, we will process a 100% refund of the ticket price within 15 working days after receiving the refund request.

âœ¨Ticket holders from the original event can exchange their tickets for entry at the venue. Even if you decide not to attend after arriving at the venue, on-site refund services will be provided.

We hope to offer the greatest convenience to every traveler who supports Spaceport. For the die-hard fans who chose to continue waiting in March and have already exchanged their tickets, the originally planned compensation scheme will still apply to the new dates.

You can find detailed refund procedures and loyal fan ticket exchange compensation plans on our Instagram homepage linktree. Click the link to view. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us anytime. You are also welcome to join our official LINE customer service for inquiries. Our team is dedicated to providing you with full support.

A female punk band from the UK.

Combining the energy of punk rock with the roughness of garage rock. Their live performances in their hometown of Brighton and London have always been sold out, and they have established an extraordinary popularity among young people.

Â 

Their music is characterized by uptempo, distorted guitar riffs and powerful drum beats.

In addition, their lyrics often express their appeals for social issues and women's rights, and their music conveys strong messages.

Â 

Their music is inspired by Brighton's vibrant music scene and its diversity, with their passionate performance style successfully captivating audiences and winning over a younger generation of fans.

According to the second ticket return plan of Laws & Regulations of â€œMinistry of Cultureâ€, Â tickets are refundable with 5% return handing fee for three days ONLY after you purchase them. For example:
Tickets purchased on 2024/3/21Â must be mailed to KKTIX before 2024/3/25. Tickets mailed out on and after 2024/3/26Â for refund will NOT be accepted.
Tickets purchased on 2024/3/28Â must be mailed to KKTIX before 2024/4/1. Tickets mailed out on and after 2024/4/2Â for refund will NOT be accepted.

In order to process your refund request, physical tickets must be mailed to KKTIX before the due date. For KKTIX address, please refer to KKTIX REFUND POLICY.

NOTE: If you choose Family Mart as ticket collect method, you will still need to pick up your ticket at Family Mart and send it to KKTIX.

Tennyson King (ç™¾åŸ) and Van Lefan (æ¨‚å‡¡) are folk pop artists touring from Canada with over multiple concerts across Taiwan in April 2024. They share songs in English and Chinese, backed by warm guitar tones, catchy flute melodies and a beautiful mix of vocal harmonies. Their music serves as existential reflections on finding magic and purpose within the ordinary, and prayers for collective liberation.
--------------------------------------------------
Tennyson King ç™¾åŸ Biography
Tennyson King (ç™¾åŸ) is an award-winning, nomadic, folk musician who has captivated audiences from across the globe with his reverberant, punchy songs and humorous stories of life on the road. Tennyson King's music offers solace for the soul and a heartfelt embrace, encapsulated by his velvety vocals, rhythmic guitar, and the pulsating heartbeat of his kick drum â€“ the genuine essence of a Chinese-Canadian folk troubadour.
---------------------------------------------------------
Van Lefan æ¨‚å‡¡ Biography
Van Lefan (æ¨‚å‡¡) is a Taiwanese sound, movement, and visual artist. With her voice, guitar, and flute, she moves between folk, pop, and experimental sound, writing songs that are inquiries into both personal and collective experiences. Her works serve as existential reflections on finding magic and purpose within the ordinary, and prayers for collective liberation.

The Itchyworms, those infectious purveyors of Pinoy pop, are on a mission to spread their musical magic far and wide!

Last year saw these merry melody-makers jet-setting to the USA, Singapore, and Japan, and they've got even bigger plans for 2024!

Their "world exploration tour" is set to hit even more exciting destinations, with Australia, Taiwan, Japan, and Canada all on the itinerary!

é‚å‘ 11 é€±å¹´çš„ Organik Festival æœ¬æ¬¡ä¾èˆŠå®šä½åœ¨åŒ—æµ·å²¸çš„åŠå³¶ç§˜å¢ƒï¼Œ4 æœˆ 26 è‡³ 28 æ—¥å‘ˆç¾æ™å¤œä¸é–“æ–·çš„é•·é€±æœ«å„€å¼ï¼ŒæŒçºŒæˆå°±ä¸€å ´å®Œæ•´æ²ˆæµ¸æ–¼ç¯€å¥èˆ‡æ—‹å¾‹ä¹‹ä¸­ï¼Œæœ¬åœ°æ¥µç‚ºçç¨€ä¸”æ¥µè‡´çš„éŸ³æ¨‚ç¥­é«”é©—ã€‚

è‡³æ–¼é‚€ä¾†çš„æµ·å…§å¤–é™£å®¹å…±è¨ˆ 34 çµ„ï¼Œé›†çµä¾†è‡ªå…¨çƒä¿±æ¨‚éƒ¨èˆ‡éŸ³æ¨‚ç¥­çš„å¸¸å®¢é™è‡¨ï¼›ä¸‰å€‹èˆå°å‰‡åŒ…æ‹¬ä¾å±±é¢æµ·çš„çµ•æ™¯ Organik Stageã€Red Pillars å»¢å¢Ÿç©ºé–“ã€Ambient æº«å®¤ï¼›å…¶ä»–é‚„æœ‰çœ¾å¤šè±å¯Œçš„é£²é£Ÿæ”¤ä½èˆ‡å·¥ä½œåŠç­‰ï¼ŒåŒæ™‚ç›¡äº«è‡¨è¿‘ç•¶åœ°çš„è‡ªç„¶èˆ‡æ–‡åŒ–é¢¨å…‰ã€‚

Organik Festival returns to the hidden island on the northern coast from April 26th to 28th for the 11th edition of our annual ritual. Join us and immerse yourselves in three days of nonstop rhythm and melody.

Featuring 34 acts from both local and international scenes, including renowned artists from clubs and festivals worldwide, the event will showcase three stages: the breathtaking Organik Stage, framed by mountains and sea; the Red Pillars, nestled in an abandoned warehouse; and the Ambient greenhouse. Attendees can also indulge in diverse food stalls, engage in workshops, and soak in the natural and cultural wonders of the surroundings.

In order to process your refund request, physical tickets must be mailed to KKTIX before the due date. For KKTIX address, please refer toÂ KKTIX REFUND POLICY.

NOTE: If you choose Family Mart as ticket collect method, you will still need to pick up your ticket at Family Mart and send it to KKTIX.

ã€ŠANSW1Rã€‹ï¼Œä¸åŒç¬¬ä¸€å¼µå°ˆè¼¯ã€ŒPHASELESSã€ï¼Œé€™æ¬¡çš„å…§å®¹è¡¨é”äº†PG ONEå°è‡ªèº«çš„æ€è€ƒèˆ‡é‡æ‹¾è‡ªä¿¡ã€‚ANSW1Rå¦‚åæ‰€è¿°ï¼ŒåŒ…å«è‘—ç‹å”¯æ¥šè‡ªæˆ‘æ€è€ƒçš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œè¦ªæƒ…èˆ‡æ„›æƒ…çš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œé¢å°äººç”Ÿçš„åå·èˆ‡å†·å˜²ç†±è«·çš„å¿ƒæ…‹ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸åŒçš„ç’°å¢ƒä¸‹å’Œç¶“æ­·ä¸­å°‹æ‰¾è‡ªå·±çš„åˆå¿ƒï¼ŒçœŸæ­£çš„ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯ä»€éº½ä¸¦ä¸é‡è¦ï¼Œä¸€è¬å€‹äººå¿ƒé‡Œï¼Œæœ‰ä¸€è¬ç¨®ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œæœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯ä½ å…§å¿ƒçš„è¿½æ±‚ï¼Œæ†§æ†¬èˆ‡å¸Œæœ›ã€‚

After nearly a year and a half of preparation, PG ONE is set to release his second official album, 'ANSW1R.' The album includes 13 tracks, featuring popular singles such as 'éƒ½æ˜¯ä½ ' (Because of you) and the pre-release single 'NO CAP.' Collaborating with longtime partners including producers H3R3, DIESI, and BLAZO, PG ONE also brings in new collaborators, including BEAT MAKERs Shunde, TIM, and POLOBEAR.

Diverging from his first album, 'PHASELESS,' 'ANSW1R' reflects PG ONE's introspection and rediscovery of confidence. As the title suggests, 'ANSW1R' contains the answers to PG ONE's self-reflection, family, and love. Facing life's challenges and navigating through sarcasm and ridicule, the album explores his journey in different environments, searching for his true self. The actual answers may not be crucial; there are ten thousand different answers in people's hearts. What matters most is the pursuit, aspirations, and hopes within one's inner self.

Consumers can request ticket refunds or exchanges within 3 days (excluding the purchase day) after purchasing the tickets. Requests made on the 4th day or later will not be accepted. The refund/exchange date is based on the date the physical ticket is mailed or the date the email is received. 5% handling fee will be charged for ticket refunds.

Purchases made on January 5, 2024, can be refunded until January 10, 2024 (inclusive). Refund requests received for physical ticket delivery or email delivery starting from January 11, 2024, will no longer be accepted.

Purchases made on January 13, 2024, can be refunded until January 17, 2024 (inclusive). Refund requests received for physical ticket delivery or email delivery starting from January 18, 2024, will no longer be accepted.

ã€ŠANSW1Rã€‹ï¼Œä¸åŒç¬¬ä¸€å¼µå°ˆè¼¯ã€ŒPHASELESSã€ï¼Œé€™æ¬¡çš„å…§å®¹è¡¨é”äº†PG ONEå°è‡ªèº«çš„æ€è€ƒèˆ‡é‡æ‹¾è‡ªä¿¡ã€‚ANSW1Rå¦‚åæ‰€è¿°ï¼ŒåŒ…å«è‘—ç‹å”¯æ¥šè‡ªæˆ‘æ€è€ƒçš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œè¦ªæƒ…èˆ‡æ„›æƒ…çš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œé¢å°äººç”Ÿçš„åå·èˆ‡å†·å˜²ç†±è«·çš„å¿ƒæ…‹ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸åŒçš„ç’°å¢ƒä¸‹å’Œç¶“æ­·ä¸­å°‹æ‰¾è‡ªå·±çš„åˆå¿ƒï¼ŒçœŸæ­£çš„ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯ä»€éº½ä¸¦ä¸é‡è¦ï¼Œä¸€è¬å€‹äººå¿ƒé‡Œï¼Œæœ‰ä¸€è¬ç¨®ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œæœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯ä½ å…§å¿ƒçš„è¿½æ±‚ï¼Œæ†§æ†¬èˆ‡å¸Œæœ›ã€‚

After nearly a year and a half of preparation, PG ONE is set to release his second official album, 'ANSW1R.' The album includes 13 tracks, featuring popular singles such as 'éƒ½æ˜¯ä½ ' (Because of you) and the pre-release single 'NO CAP.' Collaborating with longtime partners including producers H3R3, DIESI, and BLAZO, PG ONE also brings in new collaborators, including BEAT MAKERs Shunde, TIM, and POLOBEAR.

Diverging from his first album, 'PHASELESS,' 'ANSW1R' reflects PG ONE's introspection and rediscovery of confidence. As the title suggests, 'ANSW1R' contains the answers to PG ONE's self-reflection, family, and love. Facing life's challenges and navigating through sarcasm and ridicule, the album explores his journey in different environments, searching for his true self. The actual answers may not be crucial; there are ten thousand different answers in people's hearts. What matters most is the pursuit, aspirations, and hopes within one's inner self.

In accordance with the regulations set by the Ministry of Culture regarding the 'Standardized Contract for Cultural and Performing Arts Tickets - Required and Prohibited Clauses,' Article 6 outlines four options for the ticket refund and exchange policy. This event adopts Option 2: Consumers may request a refund or exchange within 3 days after purchasing the ticket (excluding the purchase day). However, if the consumer purchases the ticket before the deadline but receives the ticket after the deadline or has not received the ticket by the start of the performance, they may still request a refund or exchange. This regulation does not apply to ticket retrieval at FamilyMart, as tickets can be collected on the purchase day

Consumers must purchase tickets and provide valid personal information with their real names. When assisting friends or family in purchasing tickets, consent from the individual whose personal information is being used must be obtained. Purchasing tickets with false information may constitute a violation of Article 210 of the Criminal Code: "Forgery of Private Documents," which carries a penalty of up to five years of imprisonment. Additionally, according to Article 10-1, Paragraph 3 of the Cultural and Creative Industries Development Act: "Using false information or other improper means to purchase tickets for cultural and artistic performances through computers or other related devices, and obtaining booking or ticket collection certificates, shall be punished with imprisonment for up to three years or fined up to NT$3 million, or both." The organizers and KKTIX have the right to immediately cancel the consumer's order in such cases. Please refrain from engaging in unlawful activities.

Long-awaited! The return of the king, PG ONE, is set to make a grand entrance in Taipei!

After successful tours in various locations and a sold-out encore in Hong Kong, PG ONE is gearing up for the highly anticipated Taipei performance with his latest masterpiece, 'ANSW1R'!

In his new album 'ANSW1R', PG ONE reflects on himself, rediscovering confidence and seeking answers in the process. The album explores themes of family, love, and navigating the challenges and mockery of life.

Amidst diverse experiences, PG ONE rediscovers his initial aspirations, realizing the unpredictable nature of the truth. With a myriad of interpretations in the hearts of many, the key lies in the pursuit of one's innermost desiresâ€”the sparks of dreams and hope.

In accordance with the regulations set by the Ministry of Culture regarding the 'Standardized Contract for Cultural and Performing Arts Tickets - Required and Prohibited Clauses,' Article 6 outlines four options for the ticket refund and exchange policy. This event adopts Option 2: Consumers may request a refund or exchange within 3 days after purchasing the ticket (excluding the purchase day). However, if the consumer purchases the ticket before the deadline but receives the ticket after the deadline or has not received the ticket by the start of the performance, they may still request a refund or exchange. This regulation does not apply to ticket retrieval at FamilyMart, as tickets can be collected on the purchase day

Engaging in any form of resale for profit (regardless of reasons such as proxy fees, transportation costs, subsidies, etc.) is in violation of Article 64, Paragraph 2 of the Social Order Maintenance Act. Additionally, according to Article 10-1, Paragraph 2 of the Cultural and Creative Industries Development Act, those selling tickets at prices exceeding the face value are subject to fines ranging from ten to fifty times the face value per ticket, imposed by the municipal or county (city) government, depending on the number of tickets. Please refrain from engaging in such activities to avoid legal consequences.

The organizers and KKTIX have the right to immediately cancel the consumer's order in such cases. Please refrain from engaging in unlawful activities.

According to the second ticket return plan of Laws & Regulations of â€œMinistry of Cultureâ€, Â tickets are refundable with 5% return handing fee for three days ONLY after you purchase them. For example:
Tickets purchased on 2024/3/21Â must be mailed to KKTIX before 2024/3/25. Tickets mailed out on and after 2024/3/26Â for refund will NOT be accepted.
Tickets purchased on 2024/3/28Â must be mailed to KKTIX before 2024/4/1. Tickets mailed out on and after 2024/4/2Â for refund will NOT be accepted.

In order to process your refund request, physical tickets must be mailed to KKTIX before the due date. For KKTIX address, please refer to KKTIX REFUND POLICY.

NOTE: If you choose Family Mart as ticket collect method, you will still need to pick up your ticket at Family Mart and send it to KKTIX.

In accordance with the regulations set by the Ministry of Culture regarding the 'Standardized Contract for Cultural and Performing Arts Tickets - Required and Prohibited Clauses,' Article 6 outlines four options for the ticket refund and exchange policy. This event adopts Option 2: Consumers may request a refund or exchange within 3 days after purchasing the ticket (excluding the purchase day). However, if the consumer purchases the ticket before the deadline but receives the ticket after the deadline or has not received the ticket by the start of the performance, they may still request a refund or exchange. This regulation does not apply to ticket retrieval at FamilyMart, as tickets can be collected on the purchase day

Consumers must purchase tickets and provide valid personal information with their real names. When assisting friends or family in purchasing tickets, consent from the individual whose personal information is being used must be obtained. Purchasing tickets with false information may constitute a violation of Article 210 of the Criminal Code: "Forgery of Private Documents," which carries a penalty of up to five years of imprisonment. Additionally, according to Article 10-1, Paragraph 3 of the Cultural and Creative Industries Development Act: "Using false information or other improper means to purchase tickets for cultural and artistic performances through computers or other related devices, and obtaining booking or ticket collection certificates, shall be punished with imprisonment for up to three years or fined up to NT$3 million, or both." The organizers and KKTIX have the right to immediately cancel the consumer's order in such cases. Please refrain from engaging in unlawful activities.
